text: Adam Carolla (born May 27, 1964) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, voice artist, and comedian. He is the voice of Birchum in Crank Yankers. He played Commander Nebula in Buzz Lightyear. He is now in the movie No Safe Spaces. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Los Angeles County, California Category:American radio personalities Category:American television talk show hosts Category:American voice actors Category:Carpenters Category:Comedians from Los Angeles Category:Participants in American reality television series
title: Adam Carolla
